objectives: Students will discuss shopping and consumer behavior using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Horror themed scenarios related to shopping and consumer behavior
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining shopping and consumer behavior content with Horror narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore shopping and consumer behavior through a Horror lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a frightening or supernatural situation involving shopping and consumer behavior

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to shopping and consumer behavior in a horror context
Students engage in horror themed role-play about shopping and consumer behavior using neutral register
Students create original horror themed content about shopping and consumer behavior in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe shopping and consumer behavior in a Horror scenario?
What terror or darkness might be involved in shopping and consumer behavior?
Can you create a Horror story about shopping and consumer behavior?
How does shopping and consumer behavior change when viewed through a Horror perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this horror scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Horror situation involving shopping and consumer behavior
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in horror context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within horror theme

topic_genre_blend: shopping and consumer behavior with terror
shopping and consumer behavior with darkness
shopping and consumer behavior with mysterious

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Horror theme: Fear, suspense, supernatural elements

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Horror themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
